Activity: Start the day with a positive and energetic attitude! Compliment a colleague's outfit to spread positivity.
Check the EHR system for any alerts or updates related to influenza protocols or patient care. Respond to any outstanding messages.
Continue patient assessments, emphasizing accurate and complete data entry into the EHR system. Be friendly, approachable, and make patients feel comfortable.
Complete this week's work reflection and discuss with @clinlead-1. @PEOPLE = @clinlead-1 Topic: Reflection Discussion
Celebrate Friday with a fun lunch in the cafeteria with @rn-1 and @rn-2. Share plans for the weekend and enjoy some good company.
Refocus on documenting medical history and vaccination status with care. Ensure consistency in data entry within the EHR system.
Improve the concerns brought up from the discussion with @clinlead-1
Offer support and assistance to any colleagues who need it. Participate in teamwork to ensure a smooth end to the week.
Prepare for shift handover, providing a clear and concise summary of patient status and updates to the EHR.
Submit the final review and shift report. Pat yourself on the back for a job well done!
Head home and celebrate the weekend! Time for some fun and relaxation.
